|brand = Seagate |model = BlackArmor NAS |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 440/420 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F5608U0D-PCB0; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU128M8DE-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |eth3chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:10:75
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.18;, |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.18;LSP Version KW LSP 4.2.7 patch21;,
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA II, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 4 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 4.74 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes, 10-pin header, populated, 3.3V TTL, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes, 20-pin header, unpopulated, CN1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, fan |addchip = PCIe to SATA RAID Controller;Marvell;88SE6121;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Low Power Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850A;;1;,,, Remote Thermal Monitor and Fan Control;On Semi;ADT7473;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down Controller w/ LP LDO, RTC;Maxim;MAX17020;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;1;,,, 3A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;ANPEC;APL1085;;1;,,, 3A 12V Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;ANPEC;APW7145;;1;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5930;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4407A;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4712;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega Semiconductor;AO4818B;;1;,,, Dual D-type Positive-Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AHC74;;3;,,, 8-Bit Serial-In, Parallel-Out Shift Register;NXP;74HC164D;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;TI;SN74LVC32A;;1;,,, Hex Buffer with Open-Drain Outputs;NXP;74LVC07A;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input NAND Gate;NXP;74LVC00A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2009 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0020HR7DE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "081512-1", "SHASTA MB" and "48.61U01.011" are silkscreened on the board.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/30800-seagate-blackarmor-nas-440-reviewed Seagate BlackArmor NAS 440 Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.pcworld.idg.com.au/review/seagate/blackarmor_nas_440/302486/ Seagate BlackArmor NAS 440 Reviewed on '''PCWorld'''] *[https://www.geek.com/chips/review-seagate-blackarmor-nas-440-4tb-770262/ Seagate BlackArmor NAS 440 Reviewed on '''GEEK.COM''']
